embed: <object width="640" height="390"><param name="movie" value="http://youtube.com/v/--7sgx4Cd8I?version=3&hl=en_US"></param><param name="allowFullScreen" value="true"></param><param name="allowscriptaccess" value="always"></param><embed src="http://youtube.com/v/--7sgx4Cd8I?version=3&hl=en_US" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" width="640" height="390" allowscriptaccess="always" allowfullscreen="true"></embed></object>
summary:
Programming is hard, let's keep it simple. This is a reminder of some common
sense things we can do better, as well as observations and examples of where
we can improve our code for the next guy, even if the next guy is you.
title: Coding for everyone
